text: @NikkiHaley Listen up Cult member! Have you heard of the Coronavirus Death Toll that your buddy is responsible for? No one said they were gonna take away the Police. Get it straight! Were you able to see him make an ass out of himself on his “rally” yesterday? Nice try!
